className.description: Classes to apply to the component.

fieldHelpInline.description: Displays fieldHelp inline with the checkbox/radio button.

deferTimeout.description: Integer to determine timeout for defered callback. Default: 750

onChangeDeferred.description: Defered callback called after onChange event

label.description: Either a string or false to turn the label off

labelInline.description: Pass true to format the input/label inline

labelWidth.description:
Pass a percentage to define the width of the label when it
 is displayed inline.

labelAlign.description: Aligns label content to the right if set

labelHelp.description: Text applied to tooptip of help icon

inputWidth.description:
Pass a percentage to define the width of the label when it
 is displayed inline

fieldHelp.description: A string representing a help message

validations.description: Array of validations to apply to this input

warnings.description: Array of warnings to apply to this input

info.description: Array of info to apply to this input

timeToDisappear.description:
Number which sets timing of when the message will disappear
Expected time is set in miliseconds
